sys_atf_test.description:
1. A client script sets the [Requested for] field to the current user. 2. Another client script sets the [Requested for email] field to the email address of the [Requested for] user whenever that field changes.
Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Create a user with specified roles and groups for impersonation. 2. Navigates to a module, as if a user had clicked on it 3. Validates field values on the current form.
sys_atf_test.name: Set [Requested for email] when creating a new record
sys_atf_test.sys_name: Set [Requested for email] when creating a new record
